subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Speedskating
lead_paragraph: Cherie Davis is at odds with U.S. Speedskating as her son, Shani, has navigated the sport’s insular, white world and risen to the top.
snippet: Cherie Davis is at odds with U.S. Speedskating as her son, Shani, has navigated the sport’s insular, white world and risen to the top.
